features: Interact With Friends: Meet learning friends Turtle, Tiger and Monkey who will introduce the alphabet through more than 100 age-appropriate words chosen by learning experts
Learn Categories: This baby activity book includes word categories such as pets, animals, food, mealtime, colors, activities, opposites, outside and more
Learn Sounds: Touch the words on the pages to hear new vocabulary, sound effects, and fun facts; hear the two theme songs by pressing the light-up star button
Learn Languages: This highly engaging book for kids includes words, songs, and instructions heard in both English and Spanish to promote both language skills
Included Features: This toy is intended for ages 18 months and up; requires 2 AA batteries; included for demo purposes only; new batteries recommended for regular use
body.description: Join animal friends Turtle, Tiger and Monkey as they explore new vocabulary in the Learning Friends 100 Words Book. Explore the colorful pages in this interactive baby book and touch each picture to hear the animals say toddler-appropriate words along with exciting facts and sound effects. Immerse your child in bilingual play by sliding the language switch to hear the words, songs and instructions in both English and Spanish. Touch the pictures to hear silly sound effects in the Fun Sounds mode or press the light-up star button to hear two learning songs. This is the perfect light up book for little ones that love to learn. This fun and interactive baby activity book helps boost literacy and lets your child discover new vocabulary with cute learning friends! The Learning Friends 100 Words Book focuses on improving language skills and is intended for ages 18 months and up. Interactive baby toys help boost motor skills and improve relationships. Requires 2 AA batteries. Batteries included for demo purposes only. New batteries recommended for regular use. Product Dimensions: 9.4" wide x 9.4" height x 1.9" depth.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Core Learning Skills: Early vocabulary Spanish vocabulary Colors Meet the Learning Friends! Adorable pals Turtle, Tiger and Monkey are excited to introduce new vocabulary to children. Touch the words and pictures on each page to explore words, fun facts, music and sounds. Flip the language switch and hear the words in Spanish, too.

Features Interactive Pages Touch the pictures on each page featuring words from 12 learning categories. Three Play Modes Explore the book through three different play modes. Hear the words read aloud, exciting sound effects associated with each word or fun facts. Bilingual Play Flip the switch to learn new words including colors, objects and animals in both English and Spanish. Light-Up Star Press the light-up star button to hear the Learning Friends theme and My Favorite Word songs.

Hear From Our Learning Expert "Vocabulary skills allow children to express themselves clearly and comprehend what they hear and read. Learning Friends 100 Words Book teaches words in familiar categories to highlight word relationships and includes fun fact and Spanish modes to add layers of learning that go beyond a typical first words book." Carolyn James, PhD, LeapFrog Literacy Expert

Hear From Our Learning Expert "Vocabulary skills allow children to express themselves clearly and comprehend what they hear and read. Learning Friends 100 Words Book teaches words in familiar categories to highlight word relationships and includes fun fact and Spanish modes to add layers of learning that go beyond a typical first words book." Carolyn James, PhD, LeapFrog Literacy Expert

Touch the words on each page to hear the animals introduce every word in both English and Spanish. Letters and words are woven into the story in alphabetical order with phonetic sounds to introduce ABCs to your little one through a charming tale. Kids can learn about letters, numbers, music and more on a laptop and tablet made just for them. Turn any time into story time with LeapStory! Develop a love of storytelling in children by introducing them to the enchantment of 80+ stories, poems and songs. This interactive toy introduces your child to the letters of the alphabet and the sounds they make, helps build vocabulary, and exercises fine motor skills.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars fantastic educational tool for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: The LeapFrog Learning 100 Words Book is a fantastic educational tool for toddlers. Its interactive design engages young minds, making learning an enjoyable experience. The vibrant colors and touch-sensitive buttons capture a child's attention, fostering curiosity and exploration. The inclusion of Spanish language practice adds an enriching dimension to the educational journey.The book effectively introduces essential words through pictures and sounds, aiding in vocabulary development. The interactive games make the learning process fun and interactive, helping your 3-year-old grasp basic concepts effortlessly. The bilingual feature enhances cognitive flexibility by exposing your child to both English and Spanish, promoting early language development.The durable construction ensures the book can withstand the enthusiasm of a toddler's hands. The audio quality is clear, making it easy for your child to understand and mimic the words. As a parent, you'll appreciate the educational value and the opportunity for your child to develop a foundation in both languages. Overall, the LeapFrog Learning 100 Words Book is a commendable choice for fostering early learning and language skills in a playful and engaging manner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Fun and Engaging Way to Build Vocabulary
reviews.reviewText: The LeapFrog Learning Friends 100 Words Book is an entertaining and educational toy for kids, with colorful illustrations and spoken words. It covers categories like animals, food, and clothing, and adapts to a child's progress. The book is durable, well-designed, and supports language development, making it an excellent purchase for parents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun learning tool
reviews.reviewText: Loved English/Spanish versatility. Great for pre-readers to see 1:1 connections between words and animals/objects and even early readers to hear Spanish (or English) alternatives. Great way for preschoolers to hear a different language if living in a single language home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little toy
reviews.reviewText: I bought it months ago and my 2 year old still loves it. It's one of her favorite toys. She loves all the sounds and the music that comes out when she presses the little star. It is easy for her to flip the pages over and still functions as it should. If I remember correctly, I bought this for her first birthday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Engaging for little ones
reviews.reviewText: This book came with batteries installed and working well. It has a switch to select Spanish or English. There are also three modes to select, to get different responses from each image. It’s not too loud, and it’s very responsive to touch- the lightest tap activates the voice.Because I hold the book with a child in my lap to “read” it with them, I wish it had a small handle on the left side, or on both sides, instead of the one on top. It’s tricky to hold it the way I normally hold a book without my fingers accidentally touching the left page and activating sounds.It seems to be durable and has features that will entertain and educate for an extended time. I found it in the three-year-old’s room, so it appears she was enjoying it along with her 16 month old brother.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars speech therapist approved!
reviews.reviewText: I'm a speech therapist and I bought this for my nephew as a Christmas gift. This book is AWESOME! It's very easy for kids to use and even I liked playing with it. The vocabulary is age-appropriate and has some niche words that help expand vocabulary too. Under each picture it has the word in English and Spanish (though Spanish word is in smaller text). I like how easy it is to switch to Spanish mode too. My nephew is being raised bilingual with English and Spanish, so his mom found this extra helpful! I will be getting my son his own copy once he's a few months older.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Book For Young Children
reviews.reviewText: I like the dual language feature on the book. It's colorful and fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great learning toy!
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased one for several nieces, nephews, and friends now. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewTitle: Mucho mejor de lo que esperaba
reviews.reviewText: Tarde en decidirme si debía o no comprarlo. Es una maravilla de producto, mis hijos aman los libros y este es una excelente opción, es bilingüe, tiene varias páginas y diferentes temáticas y actividades. Es un libro para no aburrirse y para llevarlo de viaje sin tanto bulto.
Nunca lo recibí ni el reembolso

Every time you touch a picture, it'll read it and play a sound effect. Unfortunately, the sound effects are most of the time completely unrelated to whatever you touch. Touch a shirt? What sound does a shirt make? Who knows, here's a spring sound! Touch any food? Here's an obnoxious "nom nom nom" sound every time. What sound does "hand" make? How about "red"? Or "little"? Yeah, whatever you're thinking, it's not that apparently. Really annoying.
Good to teach toddler words. Retail price costs more than 2x. Toddler (and mother) is happy with it.
